name: ARS Electronica #2 Dancing with Light
description:
Video feedback piece for ARS Electronica 2021, Festival for Art, Technology, & Society
Garden NEW YORK CITY
8-12 Sept. 

This work explores remix culture by running found footage into a DVD player and further resampling it by running it into a video mixer with internal feedback. As the light ran across the screen, I played with the knobs on my machine to make rainbow colors dance.
